actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to expand the military student identifier program to cover students with a parent who serves in the reserve component of the Armed Forces.
short_title: Supporting Children of the National Guard and Reserve Act

summary.text:
Supporting Children of the National Guard and Reserve Act

This bill strikes on active duty from a statute related to the military student identifier program. (This language was stricken from the statute by P.L. 116-92.)

titles.title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to expand the military student identifier program to cover students with a parent who serves in the reserve component of the Armed Forces.
Supporting Children of the National Guard and Reserve Act
